text: Bartolo Pellegrino (26 October 1934http://www.ars.sicilia.it/deputati/pellegrino- bartolomeohttps://onoranzefunebri24.it/necrologi/bartolo-pellegrino – 28 July 2019) was an Italian politician who served as a Sicilian Regional Deputy. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian politicians
title: Bartolo Pellegrino
